Package client.gui.elements

Class CardSwitcher

java.lang.Object
client.gui.elements.CardSwitcher
public class CardSwitcher
extends java.lang.Object
A cards switcher with an action listener that enable multiple or single selection

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CardSwitcher.CardMouseListener
    The mouse event manager for the card switcher

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CardSwitcher​(PPanelContainer bodyContainer, GuiView guiView)
    Constructor: build a card switcher

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void setHeading​(java.lang.String heading)
    Sets the text of the card switcher heading
    void setSingleCardLabel​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> owners)
    Sets the card label to be shown below each card
    void showCardDetails()
    Adds the card details container to the default container in a default position if the switcher has already been added.
    void showSwitcher​(java.util.List<Card> visibleCards, boolean selectable)
    Adds the switcher to the container in a default position with a single selection action listener
    void showSwitcher​(java.util.List<Card> chosenCards, int numCards)
    Adds the switcher to the container in a default position with a multiple selection action listener The switcher contains all the cards except a specified set of cards

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSwitcher

      public CardSwitcher​(PPanelContainer bodyContainer, GuiView guiView)
      Constructor: build a card switcher
      Parameters:
      bodyContainer - The container of the card switcher
      guiView - The guiView that controls the bodyContainer

  • Method Details

    • setHeading

      public void setHeading​(java.lang.String heading)
      Sets the text of the card switcher heading
      Parameters:
      heading - The text to be shown

    • setSingleCardLabel

      public void setSingleCardLabel​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> owners)
      Sets the card label to be shown below each card
      Parameters:
      owners - The label values or null value to clear the labels

    • showSwitcher

      public void showSwitcher​(java.util.List<Card> visibleCards, boolean selectable)
      Adds the switcher to the container in a default position with a single selection action listener
      Parameters:
      visibleCards - All the cards to be added to the switcher
      selectable - True if a single card can be selected, otherwise false

    • showSwitcher

      public void showSwitcher​(java.util.List<Card> chosenCards, int numCards)
      Adds the switcher to the container in a default position with a multiple selection action listener The switcher contains all the cards except a specified set of cards
      Parameters:
      chosenCards - The cards not to be shown
      numCards - The number of cards to be selected

    • showCardDetails

      public void showCardDetails()
      Adds the card details container to the default container in a default position if the switcher has already been added.
